subject: Automobile Racing
Daytona 500 (Auto Race)
Asphalt
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: New asphalt resulted in dangerous speeds, mandates to address them, and an unusual tandem style: two cars drive close, one pushing the other.
snippet: New asphalt resulted in dangerous speeds, mandates to address them, and an unusual tandem style: two cars drive close, one pushing the other.
